verses.verse: And the heavens <WH8064> and the earth <WH776> were finished <WH3615>, and all the host of them <WH6635>.

And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> God <WH430> finished <WH3615> his work <WH4399> which he had made <WH6213>; and he rested <WH7673> on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> from all his work <WH4399> which he had made <WH6213>.

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, and hallowed <WH6942> it <WH3588>; because that in it he rested <WH7673> from all his work <WH4399> which God <WH430> had created <WH1254> and made <WH6213>.

These <WH428> are the generations <WH8435> of the heavens <WH8064> and of the earth <WH776> when they were created <WH1254>, in the day <WH3117> that Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> made <WH6213> earth <WH776> and heaven <WH8064>.

And no plant <WH7880> of the field <WH7704> was yet <WH2962> in the earth <WH776>, and no herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704> had yet <WH2962> sprung up <WH6779>; for <WH3588> Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> had not <WH3808> caused it to rain <WH4305> upon the earth <WH776>: and there was not <WH369> a man <WH120> to till <WH5647> the ground <WH127>;
but there went up <WH5927> a mist <WH108> from <WH4480> the earth <WH776>, and watered <WH8248> the whole face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> man <WH120> of the dust <WH6083> of <WH4480> the ground <WH127>, and breathed <WH5301> into his nostrils <WH639> the breath <WH5397> of life <WH2416>; and man <WH120> became a living <WH2416> soul <WH5315>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> planted <WH5193> a garden <WH1588> eastward <WH6924>, in Eden <WH5731>; and there <WH8033> he put <WH7760> the man <WH120> whom <WH834> he had formed <WH3335>.

And out <WH4480> of the ground <WH127> made <WH6779> Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> to grow <WH6779> every tree <WH6086> that is pleasant <WH2530> to the sight <WH4758>, and good <WH2896> for food <WH3978>; the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416> also in the midst <WH8432> of the garden <WH1588>, and the tree <WH6086> of the <WH1847> knowledge of good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>.
And a river <WH5104> went out <WH3318> of Eden <WH5731> to water <WH8248> the garden <WH1588>; and from thence it was parted <WH6504>, and became four <WH702> heads <WH7218>.
The name <WH8034> of the first <WH259> is Pishon <WH6376>: that <WH1931> is it which compasseth <WH5437> the whole land <WH776> of Havilah <WH2341>, where <WH834> there is gold <WH2091>;
and the gold <WH2091> of that <WH1931> land <WH776> is good <WH2896>: there is bdellium <WH916> and the onyx <WH7718> stone <WH68>.
And the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> river <WH5104> is Gihon <WH1521>: the same is it that compasseth <WH5437> the whole land <WH776> of Cush <WH3568>.

And the name <WH8034> of the third <WH7992> river <WH5104> is Hiddekel <WH2313>: that is it which goeth in front <WH1980> of <WH6926> Assyria <WH804>. And the fourth <WH7243> river <WH5104> is the Euphrates <WH6578>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> took <WH3947> the man <WH120>, and put him <WH3240> into the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731> to dress <WH5647> it and to keep it <WH8104>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> the man <WH120>, saying <WH559>, Of every tree <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588> thou mayest freely <WH398> eat <WH398>:

but of the tree <WH6086> of the knowledge <WH1847> of good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>, thou shalt not eat <WH398> of it <WH3117>: for in the day that thou eatest <WH398> thereof thou shalt surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> said <WH559>, It is not good <WH2896> that the man <WH120> should be <WH1961> alone <WH6213>; I will make him a help meet for him <WH5828>.

And out of the ground <WH127> Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> formed <WH3335> every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, and every bird <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>; and brought <WH935> them unto the man to see <WH7200> what he would call <WH7121> them <WH120>: and whatsoever the man called <WH7121> every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315>, that <WH1931> was the name thereof <WH8034>.

And the man <WH120> gave <WH7121> names <WH8034> to all cattle <WH929>, and to the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and to every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>; but for man <WH120> there was not found <WH4672> a help meet for him <WH5828>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> caused <WH5307> a deep sleep <WH8639> to fall <WH5307> upon the man <WH121>, and he slept <WH3462>; and he took <WH3947> one <WH259> of his ribs <WH6763>, and closed up <WH5462> the flesh instead thereof <WH1320>:
and the rib <WH6763>, which Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> had taken <WH3947> from the man <WH120>, made <WH1129> he a woman <WH802>, and brought <WH935> her unto the man <WH120>.

And the man <WH120> said <WH559>, This <WH2063> is now <WH6471> bone <WH6106> of my bones <WH6106>, and flesh <WH1320> of my flesh <WH1320>: she <WH2063> shall be called <WH7121> Woman <WH802>, because she <WH2063> was taken <WH3947> out of Man <WH376>.
Therefore <WH3651> shall a man <WH376> leave <WH5800> his father <WH1> and his mother <WH517>, and shall cleave <WH1692> unto his wife <WH802>: and they shall be one <WH259> flesh <WH1320>.
And they were both <WH8147> naked <WH6174>, the man <WH120> and his wife <WH802>, and were not ashamed <WH954>.
